value:
$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Well, it's a new year. Let's put it
through its paces, shall we?$k$pA victory today would be a portent
of good fortune to come.$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャロン|We'd better win, then! Don't want to
start off on the wrong foot, do we?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|I hope I can be of assistance.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|I'm not really the superstitious type.
What say we make our own luck?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キヌ,ch05_47_Kinu_F_NewYear20,Face|Is everybody here? Yay! Let's party!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_NewYear20,Face|Not all of us are here to play. If you
want any hope of victory...don't take
me lightly.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Wow. What a lively crowd!$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|This place is indeed...alive. Forgive
me... I am a little overwhelmed.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|All right, listen up! The Prince and
Princess are here!$k$pLet's form an orderly line, single file,
and—hey, you! Get to the back!
No cutting!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|What's this about, Commander?
Why are you having them line up?$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Welcome to the first annual New
Year's Meet and Greet, featuring
Prince Alfonse and Princess Sharena!$k$pAnd this year's special guest is...
Princess Eir! First in line, step on up
for high fives, fist bumps, and hugs!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Um, what?$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Whoever said never meet your heroes
clearly wasn't acquainted with this
fine bunch!$k$pHey—look sharp, you two! Don't you
always say you wish you were closer
to your people? This is a win-win!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|So this is what you had planned...$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|I don't know that I'm ready to hug
or...fist bump...with strangers.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|It'll be OK, Eir. I'll make sure folks
respect your boundaries.$k$pJust do what's comfortable. I'm sure
people will be delighted even just to
shake your hand.$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|All right...  I can do that.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|The ladies are being good sports.
Don't be a stick-in-the-mud, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Very well—since it's for the people,
I'll do it. On one condition.$k$pYou will not charge these folks
a single coin.$k$p$WmMPID_年明アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_NewYear20,Face|Seriously?! That was the whole point!$k$pUgh... Fine. No charge. But surely you
won't object to voluntary donations,
at least...will you?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シャロン,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Look at this line of smiling faces!
Doesn't it warm your heart?$k$p$WmMPID_年明エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_NewYear20,Face|Yes...and my hands, besides. Who
knew a simple shake could impart
such heat?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_MF_Pair,Face|Though this endeavor began with an
unsavory motive, I have to say...
It has won me over.$k$pThese smiling faces are as fine a
reminder as any of what we fight
for in Askr. Happy New Year, all!$k$p$Sbs150|
